en.title: FE Welcomes QP Wearers, Ray Parlour (former Arsenal soccer star) and Lee Sharpe (former Manchester United soccer star)!
en.content: Former Arsenal soccer star, Ray Parlour and former Manchester United soccer star Lee Sharpe together with Steve Black (Owner of Masters Football International, UK), who were in Manila recently to film and support the "Christmas For Payatas" Charity with FE's CEO Paul Ting, were shown demonstrations of the power of FE's Quantum Pendant by FE's Spokesmen Jean Daniels and Samboy Lim. They were all hugely impressed and could not believe what FE's QPs can do but seeing is believing and said that FE's QP has tremendous potential in UK. Ray Parlour even requested for a QP for his Mum which was duly given!

They were all hugely impressed and could not believe what FE's QPs can do but seeing is believing and said that FE's QP has tremendous potential in UK. Ray Parlour even requested for a QP for his Mum which was duly given!
